Name: Bénédictine Conversion
Ingredients: 10 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Review: Tequila and mezcal-based with herbal and thyme liqueurs.
History: Adapted from a recipe created circa 2012 by Ian Cameron in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Bénédictine Conversion contains 160 calories
